N

neighborhoodManagerAPIURL - Variable in class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.PersistenceManager
URL Path to Neighbourhood Manager API
NeighbourhoodManagerConnector - Class in eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons
Provides methods for communication with the Neighbourhood Manager.
NeighbourhoodManagerConnector(XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.NeighbourhoodManagerConnector
Constructor.
neighbourhoodManagerServer - Variable in class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.NeighbourhoodManagerConnector
URL/IP of the NM server.
NetworkMessage - Class in eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages
This is the basis for OGWAPI network messaging protocol and serves as a parent class for request, response and event.
NetworkMessage(XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessage
Basic constructor for the message.
NetworkMessageEvent - Class in eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages
This extension of NetworkMessage is adapted to facilitate event mechanism.
NetworkMessageEvent(XMLConfiguration, String, String, String, Map<String, String>, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageEvent
Constructor of an event message that is to be sent across the network.
NetworkMessageEvent(JsonObject, XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageEvent
This constructor attempts to build this object by parsing incoming JSON.
NetworkMessageRequest - Class in eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages
Extended NetworkMessage that represents a request.
NetworkMessageRequest(XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageRequest
Constructor of a request message that is to be sent across the network.
NetworkMessageRequest(JsonObject, XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageRequest
This constructor attempts to build this object by parsing incoming JSON.
NetworkMessageResponse - Class in eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages
Extended NetworkMessage that represents a response.
NetworkMessageResponse(XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageResponse
Use this when constructing a message that is to be sent across the network.
NetworkMessageResponse(JsonObject, XMLConfiguration, Logger) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageResponse
This constructor attempts to build this object by parsing incoming JSON.
NetworkMessageResponse(XMLConfiguration, Logger, boolean, int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.messages.NetworkMessageResponse
Sometimes it can be beneficial to create the response message all at once, and not fill it piece by piece.
NM_API_PATH - Static variable in class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.PersistenceManager
Path to NM API.
nmConnector - Variable in class eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.CommunicationManager
A connector used for connecting to NM Manager.
